summary: Implements a Qt-based control panel for managing Web Map Service (WMS) layers within the Mission Support System UI, allowing users to add, edit, remove, reorder, and toggle visibility of WMS overlays and configure their request parameters.
business_intent: Empower mission planners and analysts to incorporate external geospatial map services into the flight planning environment, enhancing situational awareness and data richness for operational decisionâ€‘making.
